attributes.action: support the view that proposals to introduce Electronic Vehicle Identification (EVI) on motorcycles are wrong and not needed.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In a society all ready excessively burdened  with CCTV and other surveillance devices the majority of legitimate motorcycle users see the introduction of Electronic Vehicle Identification (EVI) as an erosion of their personal freedom within a democratic state.
